about_the_game:
💘Love n Life: Happy Student💘

At Reborn Entertainment, creativity drives everything we do as we’re committed to delivering fresh experiences. For us, fun isn’t just a goal—it’s the rule. Incorporating the Inventory Management system in Love n Life: Happy Student brings the excitement of dating to life in a way you’ve never seen before.

⭐ Story

You're a third-year college student living in the suburbs. After taking a competitive exam, you’re lucky enough to transfer to the prestigious Lingyun University, an elite school reserved for the best of the best. Upon arrival, you’re placed in an old dorm, where your exciting new student life begins.

⭐ Gameplay

In Love n Life: Happy Student, you'll interact with various ladies, each with her own personality and preferences. The innovative inventory management system adds a fresh twist to the dating sim genre, where the items you collect and manage can influence your relationships and interactions. Balance your time, resources, and decisions to create meaningful connections and explore multiple story paths.

⭐ Features

  • Experience dating through the unique Inventory Management system!

  • Give presentations and read books to help enhance your Socializing stats.

  • Try your hand at fishing.

  • Complete Girls’ Missions and Hidden Missions. 

  • Choose your words carefully—your choices affect affection levels with Dynamic Conversations.

  • Beautiful girls come to life with Live2D animations.

⭐ Other Features Available in the Final Game:

  • Cooking.

  • Give presentations, read books, play basketball, and engage in charity work in Daily Activities.

  • Stay connected with social apps, texting, collections, and more using your phone.

⭐ Important Note:

Please note that this is a demo, and everything is subject to change. Your constructive feedback is invaluable as we work to improve the game even further. What you experience here is just a glimpse of the vast content and features we have planned.

At Reborn, we pride ourselves on a strong history of commitment to our games, and Love n Life: Happy Student is our most ambitious project yet. Rest assured, we are dedicated to delivering the ultimate experience you deserve at launch.

Your feedback and wishlist are crucial in shaping the depth and quality of Love n Life: Happy Student. Together, let’s create something extraordinary!

💘 Liu Yating

You're in the same class as a beautiful, carefree girl who loves to explore new things. She’s destined to become your best friend.

💘 Chen Meiling

The literature teacher at your school and the dorm manager where you live. With her sweet, kind, and playful personality, she’s the teacher every student loves having in class!

💘 Qin Yilin

"Only knowledge and discipline create elite students. Without them, you're dust." The Student Council President is cool, elegant, and well-organized. She’s determined to push every student to reach their highest potential—no matter what it takes!

💘 Luna-3X

She is your funny, lively, and lovely virtual assistant who often acts silly and makes you laugh. Luna-3X is hardworking, obedient, and never gets jealous, even when you are dating other ladies.

short_description: Love n Life: Happy Student, a unique dating sim, incorporates inventory management for the first time. As a top-scoring third-year student, you are chosen to join the most prestigious college, where you’ll meet new friends. Discover intriguing personalities and the school’s mysteries.
supported_languages: English, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
